FAQ / Wave 3 / Battle Cards /
View On Teletraan1.net

LV Gamma-Disruptor Launcher

  1. LV Gamma-Disruptor Launcher states that up to 2 of them can fit in one Weapon Slot. If I were to play a 3rd one, would it replace the 2 already in the Weapon Slot or would it only replace 1 of them? [Source: WotC]
    It would only replace one of the previously equipped two.
  2. Say I have Major Shockwave with 2 LV Gamma-Disruptor Launchers, and I try to play a third copy onto him. Would the two already on him both scrap, or would only one? [Source: WotC]
    You would have to scrap only one of the two LV Gamma-Disruptos Launchers already on Major Shockwave.
